properties.name: Alonzo F. Bonsal Wildlife Preserve
properties.entrance_description: Primary pedestrian access between 21 and 25 Riverview Dr W, at the trail/bridge into the preserve.

properties.name: Anderson Park
properties.notes: County park bordered by North Mountain Ave, Parkside Rd, Bellevue Ave, and NJ Transit tracks. Point near Bellevue Ave entrance.

properties.name: Brookdale Park
properties.notes: County park spanning Bloomfield and Montclair; approx. 43 acres in Montclair. Entrance point near central parking / athletic area.

properties.name: Eagle Rock Reservation
properties.address: Eagle Rock Ave & Prospect Ave, West Orange, NJ 07052
properties.entrance_description: Main Eagle Rock Ave entrance / 9-11 Memorial observation deck and main parking area.

properties.name: Edgemont Memorial Park
properties.operator: Montclair Department of Parks and Recreation
properties.notes: Municipal park with WWI memorial obelisk and pond fed by Toney's Brook. Point at central memorial / pond area.

properties.name: Essex Park
properties.entrance_description: Approximate main entrance near Essex Park Pool and playground on Chestnut St.

properties.name: Glenfield Park
properties.notes: County park bordered by Maple Ave, Woodland Ave, Bloomfield Ave, and NJT tracks. Point near Maple Ave / community center side (approximate).

properties.name: Mills Reservation
properties.address: Normal Ave & Reservoir Dr, Cedar Grove, NJ 07009
properties.entrance_description: Normal Ave parking lot/trailhead (primary access for Montclair/Cedar Grove and Lenape Trail).

properties.name: Mountainside Park
properties.address: 205 Upper Mountain Ave, Upper Montclair, NJ 07043
properties.entrance_description: Upper Mountain Ave entrance by parking and ballfields (bike-friendly access from Upper Mountain).

properties.name: Nishuane Park
properties.address: Harrison Ave & High St, Montclair, NJ 07042
properties.operator: Montclair Department of Parks and Recreation
properties.entrance_description: Primary bike-friendly entrance on Harrison Ave at pedestrian path near playground and fields.

properties.name: Yantacaw Brook Park
properties.notes: Municipal park with pond and brook. Point at main Club Rd entrance near the pond.
